multimonster.common.pipe
Class Pipe

java.lang.Object
  multimonster.common.pipe.Pipe
public class Pipe
extends java.lang.Object

Transfers Data und Data-Control-Info from one component to the other.

Constructor Summary
Pipe()
          creates a Pipe with default buffer size and default number of channels

          creates a Pipe with the given number of channels.

                       Channel channel)

Parameters:

channel - the channel itself that should be set

setupFinished

public void setupFinished()
If called, the Pipe is set up and ready to serve.

waitForPipeSetup

public void waitForPipeSetup()
                      throws PipeClosedException
Blocks until the pipe is completly setup. Throws a PipeClosedException when the pipe is not setup within a timeout interval.

Throws:
PipeClosedException

isClosed

public boolean isClosed()
Returns:
Returns if the pipe is closed.

close

public void close()
close all channels and the pipe itself.
